key.name: relays
key.description: List of Nostr relay URLs (ws:// or wss://). Values should be normalized (lowercase scheme/host, no trailing slash) for canonical storage.

key.name: relays-window-width
key.description: Last used width for the Relay Manager dialog.

key.name: relays-window-height
key.description: Last used height for the Relay Manager dialog.

key.name: current-npub
key.description: The bech32 npub of the active identity. Empty string means not signed in.

key.name: nip46-timeout-ms
key.description: Maximum time to wait for remote signer pairing response before aborting.
